code: import XDate from'xdate';import constants from'../../commons/constants';import{generateDay}from'../../dateutils';export function calcTimeByPosition(yPosition,hourBlockHeight){let time=yPosition/hourBlockHeight;time=Math.floor(time*2)/2;const hour=Math.floor(time);const minutes=(time-Math.floor(time))*60;return{hour,minutes};}export function calcDateByPosition(xPosition,timelineLeftInset,numberOfDays=1,firstDate=new XDate()){const timelineWidth=constants.screenWidth-timelineLeftInset;const dayWidth=timelineWidth/numberOfDays;const positionIndex=Math.floor((xPosition-timelineLeftInset)/dayWidth);return generateDay(firstDate,positionIndex);}export function buildTimeString(hour=0,minutes=0,date=''){return`${date} ${hour.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${minutes.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:00`.trimStart();}export function calcTimeOffset(hourBlockHeight,hour,minutes){const now=new Date();const h=hour??now.getHours();const m=minutes??now.getMinutes();return(h+m/60)*hourBlockHeight;}
